What are the symptoms of hepatitis A? Common symptoms of hepatitis A include fever, stomach pain or discomfort, dark urine, nausea and vomiting, diarrhea, tiredness, loss of appetite, clay or ash-coloured bowel movements, & jaundice (yellowing of the skin and whites of the eyes).
